Name: Display FPS on page
Description: Can I display the current frames per second (FPS) of the page?

Notes: 1. Open **Command Menu** (`Cmd+Shift+P` or `Ctrl+Shift+P`) > Run "Show frames per second (FPS) meter".
1. Open **Command Menu** (`Cmd+Shift+P` or `Ctrl+Shift+P`) > Run "Show frames per second (FPS) meter".
